channel.title: New to this... somewhat
channel.description:
Hey everyone,
My name is Devan, I used to be a big Runescape player when I was little and slowly lost interest in the actual game and fell in love with private servers. I have experienced with making private servers before and i can run sources and people can connect and all... but... I'm not too good with coding and all... I can do some stuff like add commands and place npcs and items... but a lot of the coding I don't understand. Plus I wanna get serious and start a serious server but I want a good source to start with and maybe someone to help code for with me... it's a fun thing nothing serious. If I can possibly have some help with this or become part of a development team on a server to learn some more stuff, I would appreciate it. ([b]Sorry if I put this in the wrong area, like i said i'm new to this. If it's in wrong area just let me know where I can possibly put it.[/b])
[b]I would really appreciate any help.[/b]
Please and thanks, Devan Williams.

item.title: New to this... somewhat
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote="[C"]oder [P]erses link=topic=470393.msg3439424#msg3439424 date=1292987967]
I Will Help You Alot! I Will Get You A Good Server, Get It Online, And Code For You… All You Need Is TeamViewer. P.M. Me This Will Get Locked Most Likely Lol.[/quote]

Encouraging others to break rules is not a smart idea.

@OP
I suggest reading about Java on the ‘official’ website. (If thats what you wanna call it).
http://download.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/java/index.html

Try also looking through the ‘general programming’ section. And possibly the ‘server tutorial’ section. (There are some good tutorials).

Read full topic

item.title: New to this... somewhat
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

My advice, read lots of tutorials.

Download completed servers and look through them

other than that, i beleive you have me on msn, so just hit me up

Read full topic

@Devan1994 wrote:

Hey everyone,

My name is Devan, I used to be a big Runescape player when I was little and slowly lost interest in the actual game and fell in love with private servers. I have experienced with making private servers before and i can run sources and people can connect and all… but…
I’m not too good with coding and all… I can do some stuff like add commands and place npcs and items… but a lot of the coding I don’t understand.
